tasks.title: Code Review and Architecture Assessment
tasks.description: Review existing codebase and assess current architecture, identify improvement areas, and plan enhancements
tasks.details: Analyze the existing IT Management System codebase including server.js, client.html, html.html, and data.json. Assess current features, identify technical debt, security vulnerabilities, and areas for improvement. Document current architecture and plan enhancement strategy.
tasks.testStrategy: Create comprehensive documentation of current system state, identify all improvement opportunities, and prioritize enhancement roadmap.

tasks.title: Database Migration and Enhancement
tasks.description: Migrate from JSON file storage to proper database and enhance data management
tasks.details: Migrate existing JSON-based data storage to SQLite database with proper schema design. Create migration scripts to transfer existing tickets, users, and assets data. Implement proper database relationships, constraints, and indexing for better performance and data integrity.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all existing data is successfully migrated, database queries perform efficiently, and data integrity is maintained.

tasks.title: Authentication System Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance existing authentication system with improved security and user management
tasks.details: Enhance the existing email OTP authentication system with JWT tokens, improved session management, and role-based access control. Add password-based authentication option, user registration, password reset functionality, and enhanced security measures including rate limiting and input validation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enhanced authentication flows, security measures, and ensure backward compatibility with existing OTP system.

tasks.title: API Server Enhancement and Security
tasks.description: Enhance existing Express.js server with improved security, error handling, and API structure
tasks.details: Enhance the existing Express.js server with improved middleware, better error handling, request validation, rate limiting, CORS configuration, and security headers. Restructure API endpoints for better organization and add comprehensive logging and monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify enhanced server security, improved error handling, and all existing functionality continues to work properly.

tasks.title: User Management System Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance user management with improved CRUD operations and role-based permissions
tasks.details: Enhance existing user management functionality with improved CRUD operations, role-based permissions, user profiles, and administrative tools. Add user registration, profile management, and enhanced admin interface for user management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enhanced user management features, role-based access control, and admin interface functionality.

tasks.title: Ticket Management System Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance existing ticket management system with advanced features and improved workflow
tasks.details: Enhance the existing ticket management system with advanced features including file attachments, ticket templates, SLA management, escalation rules, and improved workflow automation. Add bulk operations, advanced filtering, and enhanced reporting capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enhanced ticket management features, file attachments, SLA compliance, and workflow automation.

tasks.title: Frontend Interface Modernization
tasks.description: Modernize existing frontend interface with improved UX and responsive design
tasks.details: Modernize the existing HTML/CSS/JavaScript frontend with improved user experience, better responsive design, modern UI components, and enhanced accessibility. Update client.html and html.html with modern design patterns, better mobile support, and improved user interface.
tasks.testStrategy: Test modernized interface across different browsers and devices, verify improved UX and accessibility compliance.

tasks.title: Advanced Dashboard and Analytics
tasks.description: Enhance existing dashboard with advanced analytics and reporting capabilities
tasks.details: Enhance the existing dashboard with advanced analytics, real-time metrics, performance KPIs, and comprehensive reporting. Add interactive charts, data visualization, export capabilities, and custom report generation. Implement SLA tracking and performance monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify enhanced dashboard displays accurate real-time data, all analytics work correctly, and reporting functions properly.

tasks.title: Knowledge Base System Implementation
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive knowledge base with search and content management
tasks.details: Implement a comprehensive knowledge base system with article creation, categorization, advanced search functionality, and content management. Include rich text editor, file attachments, FAQ management, and solution templates. Integrate with ticket system for automatic solution suggestions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test knowledge base search accuracy, content management features, and integration with ticket system.

tasks.title: Asset Management System Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance existing asset management with advanced tracking and lifecycle management
tasks.details: Enhance the existing asset management system with advanced features including hardware/software inventory tracking, license management, maintenance scheduling, asset lifecycle management, barcode scanning integration, and asset-ticket correlation. Add asset discovery and automated inventory updates.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enhanced asset tracking, maintenance scheduling, license management, and integration with ticket system.

tasks.title: Notification System Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance existing notification system with advanced features and delivery methods
tasks.details: Enhance the existing email and Socket.IO notification system with advanced features including configurable notification preferences, multiple delivery methods (email, SMS, push notifications), notification templates, and intelligent notification routing. Add notification history and delivery tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enhanced notification system, delivery methods, and notification preferences functionality.

tasks.title: Advanced Search and Filtering
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive search and filtering capabilities across all modules
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive search functionality across tickets, knowledge base, and assets with advanced filtering, sorting, and export capabilities. Add full-text search, faceted search, and search result highlighting. Include search analytics and user search behavior tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search accuracy, performance with large datasets, and search analytics functionality.

tasks.title: Security Hardening and Compliance
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive security measures and compliance standards
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive security measures including input validation, SQL injection prevention, XSS protection, CSRF tokens, rate limiting, secure file upload handling, and data encryption. Add security logging, audit trails, and compliance with data protection standards. Implement secure API endpoints and access controls.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform comprehensive security testing including penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, and compliance audits.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization and Monitoring
tasks.description: Optimize system performance and implement comprehensive monitoring
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive performance optimization including database query optimization, caching strategies, CDN integration, and performance monitoring. Add application performance monitoring (APM), error tracking, and system health monitoring. Optimize frontend loading times and API response times.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform comprehensive load testing, performance benchmarking, and verify monitoring system functionality.

tasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive testing suite and quality assurance processes
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive testing suite including unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, and automated testing pipeline. Add code quality checks, linting, and continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD) pipeline. Implement automated testing for all system components and ensure high test coverage.
tasks.testStrategy: Achieve high test coverage, implement CI/CD pipeline, and ensure all tests pass consistently.
